resources.string: Uh-oh! You are not tracking any stocks.
Stock Hawk requires internet connection to fetch stocks.\nYour data might be out of date.
Stock Hawk requires UTF-8 encoding to work. Unfortunately, your device does not support it.
Something went wrong while adding data. Please try again.
Stock server is not responding. Please try again later.
Stock server provided invalid data. Please try again.
Your Hawk does not recognise this symbol.
